name: Re.Pair
description:
Re.Pair is a two player, split-screen, local co-op Puzzle Platformer where players must work together to collect all Energy Crystals in the level and then regroup (or Re-pair) in the Green Teleportation Room. The players can rotate colour matched rooms by using the button in the center in order to create a path through the level. When both players are in a room of the same colour, both rooms will rotate simultaneously.

The game requires two gamepads to play.

Left Stick controls the character, right stick controls the camera, A (or bottom face button) activates the room button, and the right special button resets the game and quits to menu.
